content: © the water balloon a crochet pattern by east van knits pattern © aimee mergaert @eastvanknits - 2024| personal use only the water balloon this is a super quick easy crochet pattern by using a chenille instructions yarn you get water balloons that are crazy absorbent and squishy these are so easy to use you just dunk them in a bucket water balloon of water let the super absorbent yarn soak it up like a sponge round 1 8sc in magic_ring 8sts and fire away the other great thing about using this yarn is round 2 8inc 2sc in each st - 16sts they are reusable washable and dryer safe hint i have used these with my teenage boys and we find that they the opening at the end is not large enough to sew in the end do not hurt we use the rule only throw below the shoulders no when finished so i crochet over the tail left from the magic head shots make sure they are free of debris before use these ring are to be made and used at your own risk round 3 16sc 16sts skill level beginner worked in the round round 4 16sc 16sts round 5 16sc 16sts finished measurements round 6 16sc 16sts the measurements will vary with what size yarn and hook you round 7 8dec 8sts use round 8 4dec 4sts using the below yarn and hook size mine measure 4 x 2 75 round 9 4inc 2sc in each st - 8sts yarn cut yarn leaving enough yarn to finish i used bernat blanket yarn there are so many great colours to choose from finishing tie off the yarn and sew in the ends cut off the excess yarn and hooks your done 9mm hook notions stitch marker darning needle scissors abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease decrease st -
